task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I see that you're accessing this from the public website (is_public=true). This means you're not yet logged into the company system as an employee.

input.message:
Thank you for your interest in joining Bellini Coatings! Information about our time tracking procedures is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees after they've joined the company.

Once you start with us, you'll have access to our internal wiki where you can find detailed information about time tracking policies and procedures. Your manager and HR will also guide you through our processes during onboarding.

If you have general questions about our company or the hiring process, please feel free to contact us directly through our official channels.
